resources.string: The best shopping list app that makes sure you stay even
Below is a list of items that need to be bought for your apartment. Add a new item or select one or more items from the list to move them to the "Recently Purchased List" .
Below is a list of recently purchased items, along with their price and who bought them. Select "Settle the Score" to clear the Recently Purchased List and calculate the amount owed each roommate
